articles.author: Anand Krishnamoorthy
articles.title: Asian Stocks to Drop as AI Jitters Hit Wall Street: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Asian equities retreated from a record after concerns over the impact of artificial intelligence on some companies spurred a selloff in US technology stocks. Gold and silver recouped some of their losses from the prior session.
